summary:
Improved 1024x1024 lore friendly and beautiful female normalmaps.
added a beta 2048x2048;possible neckseam (they look a bit shiny,more than the body)
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Description[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/U57INYh.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][color=lightgreen]About the mod:[/color]
The mod is not a complete set of new skin texture,it's just a normalmap replacer,this means that the part of your skin that is coloured (diffusemap) will be the same.it will only chnge the subskin part (aka NORMALMAP).

-How a normalmap affect my face?

The normalmap regulates the amount of wrinkles,the cheekshape,and every kind of detail imprinted on them.In my opinion the normalmap is the base and the most important part for the look of your character.


[color=lightgreen]HOW TO INSTALL:[/color]

Well the HD version ( 2048 ) is a different thing from the new update ,and it shouldn't be mixed with the 1024 version.(if you do you 'll probably have neckseams)

The UNP version needs a special body normalmap to prefent neckseam issues,so it's recommended an intstallation.

[color=orange]SKIN TEXTURE USED IN THE LATEST PICTURES[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25588/?]Women Of Skyrim Skin NO MAKEUP VERSION![/url]
[/center]

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]UPDATE[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

[center][color=orange][size=5]NEW HD NORMALMAPS[/size][/color][/center]

[center]

This is a beta version,adds [color=orange]2048x2048[/color].It adds a lot of detail to female skin and lips.
It may happen that you have a little neckseam in certain lights,not sure about that,i use an enb setup that makes shiny skin,do it may be that.It's a [color=orange]BETA[/color] version!
[/center]

This mod replaces the vanilla female character's normalmaps,that looks blocky and old.
[center][/center][center][/center]
I used it with xce face and body textures,but you can use it with what you want.It will replace normalmaps of any other facemod,so you need to install this after!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]xce[/url]


[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Credits[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]
Xenius for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30/?]No more blocky faces[/url]
tktk1 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887/?]Pretty face[/url]
Navetsea for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5106/?]Female face retexture [/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]dimonized unp body[/url]
Nuska for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25531]High res nord skin[/url]
xs2reality for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13377/?]Sporty sexy map[/url] used as a base for unp body normalmap.
Caliente for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?]CBBE body[/url]
fgem for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29006]female orc textures[/url]
Bethesda for HD texture pack
m0ckin9bird for neckfiles

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2689072/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/EsAOIrY.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: zzjay

files.name: Smooth DARKELF for UNP STANDARD NORMALMAP
